00008 #ifndef INV_COSH_H_
00009 #define INV_COSH_H_
00010 
00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Declaration and definition of the rapidity generator                *
00013  *                                                                     *
00014  *                          g(y)~1/cosh(y-y0)                          *
00015  *                                                                     *
00016  * where y0 denotes the central maximum of the generated distribution. *
00017  *                                                                     *
00018  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00019 
00020 #include <sstream>
00021 #include <Camgen/pltstream.h>
00022 #include <Camgen/inv_gen.h>
00023 
00024 namespace Camorra
00025 {
00026     template<class value_t,class rng_t>class inv_cosh_y_generator: public inversion_s_generator<value_t,rng_t,inv_cosh_y_generator<value_t,rng_t> >
00027     {
00028         typedef inversion_s_generator< value_t,rng_t,inv_cosh_y_generator<value_t,rng_t> > direct_base_type;
00029         typedef s_generator<value_t,rng_t> base_type;
00030 
00031         public:
00032 
00033             /* Type definitions: */
00034 
00035             typedef value_t value_type;
00036             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00037             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00038 
00039             /* Public data: */
00040 
00041             const value_type* const y0;
00042 
00043             /* Default constructor: */
00044 
00045             inv_cosh_y_generator(const value_type* y0_=NULL):y0(y0_)
00046             {
00047                 refresh_params();
00048                 this->refresh_s_min();
00049                 this->refresh_s_max();
00050             }
00051 
00052             /* Constructor with central value argument: */
00053 
00054             inv_cosh_y_generator(value_type* y_,const value_type* y0_=NULL):direct_base_type(y_),y0(y0_)
00055             {
00056                 refresh_params();
00057                 this->refresh_s_min();
00058                 this->refresh_s_max();
00059             }
00060 
00061             /* Copy constructor: */
00062 
00063             inv_cosh_y_generator(const inv_cosh_y_generator<value_t,rng_t>& other):direct_base_type(other),y0(other.y0){}
00064 
00065             /* Public modifiers: */
00066             /*-------------------*/
00067 
00068             bool refresh_params()
00069             {
00070                 this->min_cumulant_lim=(value_type)0;
00071                 this->max_cumulant_lim=pi;
00072                 return (this->refresh_s_min() and this->refresh_s_max());
00073 
00074             }
00075 
00076             /* Public const methods: */
00077             /*-----------------------*/
00078 
00079             /* Clone method: */
00080 
00081             inv_cosh_y_generator<value_t,rng_t>* clone() const
00082             {
00083                 return new inv_cosh_y_generator<value_t,rng_t>(*this);
00084             }
00085 
00086             /* Central peak readout: */
00087 
00088             value_type peak() const
00089             {
00090                 return (y0==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*y0);
00091             }
00092 
00093             /* Probability function: */
00094 
00095             value_type pdf(const value_type& y) const
00096             {
00097                 value_type x(std::exp(y-peak()));
00098                 return (value_type)2*x/(x*x+(value_type)1);
00099             }
00100 
00101             /* Cumulant: */
00102 
00103             value_type cdf(const value_type& y) const
00104             {
00105                 return (value_type)2*std::atan(std::exp(y-peak()));
00106             }
00107 
00108             /* Inverse of the cumulant: */
00109 
00110             value_type inverse_cdf(const value_type rho) const
00111             {
00112                 return (peak()+std::log(std::tan(0.5*rho)));
00113             }
00114             
00115             /* Double-dispatch integrator functions. */
00116             
00117             value_type integrate_with(const s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00118             {
00119                 LOG(warning)<<"Integration method not defined...returning 0"<<ENDLOG(warning);
00120                 return 0;
00121             }
00122             value_type integrate_with(const BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00123             {
00124                 LOG(warning)<<"Integration method not defined...returning 0"<<ENDLOG(warning);
00125                 return 0;
00126             }
00127             value_type integrate_with(const pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00128             {
00129                 LOG(warning)<<"Integration method not defined...returning 0"<<ENDLOG(warning);
00130                 return 0;
00131             }
00132             value_type integrate_with(const uni_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00133             {
00134                 LOG(warning)<<"Integration method not defined...returning 0"<<ENDLOG(warning);
00135                 return 0;
00136             }
00137             value_type integrate_with(const Dd_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00138             {
00139                 LOG(warning)<<"Integration method not defined...returning 0"<<ENDLOG(warning);
00140                 return 0;
00141             }
00142 
00143             /* Serialization: */
00144             /*----------------*/
00145 
00146             /* Overridden printing function: */
00147 
00148             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) const
00149             {
00150                 os<<"1/cosh("<<peak()<<')';
00151                 return os;
00152             }
00153 
00154             /* Outputs the type of the generator. */
00155 
00156             std::string type() const
00157             {
00158                 return "invcosh";
00159             }
00160 
00161             /* Outputs the detailed type of the generator. */
00162 
00163             std::string detailed_type() const
00164             {
00165                 std::stringstream ss;
00166                 ss<<"1/cosh("<<peak()<<')';
00167                 return ss.str();
00168             }
00169 
00170             /* Plotting utility method. */
00171 
00172             function_stream* pdf_plot(const value_type& x) const
00173             {
00174                 value_type n=x/this->norm;
00175                 std::ostringstream sstrm;
00176                 sstrm<<n<<"/cosh(x-"<<peak()<<')';
00177                 function_stream* result=new function_stream(sstrm.str());
00178                 result->title="density";
00179                 result->style="lines";
00180                 return result;
00181             }
00182 
00183         private:
00184 
00185             static const value_t pi;
00186     };
00187     template<class value_t,class rng_t>const value_t inv_cosh_y_generator<value_t,rng_t>::pi(std::acos(-(value_t)1));
00188 }
